basics.name: Xiaowei Ou
basics.label: Astronomer in training
basics.summary: A graduate student at MIT, working on stars in the Milky Way.

work.name: Department of Physics, MIT
work.summary: Working on stars in the Milky Way with Professors Anna Frebel and Lina Necib.

recent publications.name: The dark matter profile of the Milky Way inferred from its circular velocity curve
recent publications.summary: For understanding the nature of dark matter (DM) on the MW scale, I studied the MW circular velocity curve to probe the Galaxy's potential and update the model of the DM density profile.

recent publications.name: Synthetic Gaia DR3 surveys from the FIRE cosmological simulations of Milky-Way-mass galaxies
recent publications.summary: Working with collaborators, I adapted the code base ananke to build a Gaia DR3 synthetic survey.

recent publications.name: The Rise of the R-Process in the Gaia-Sausage/Enceladus Dwarf Galaxy
recent publications.summary: We established the existence of delayed r-process enrichment from a clear rise of r-process element abundance in the disrupted dwarf GSE.
